title: 09/17/2021 - HOUR 1 - Giants, Brady, Meyer
itunes:title: 09/17/2021 - HOUR 1 - Giants, Brady, Meyer
description:
The Giants are showing us they don't trust Daniel Jones

Tom Brady says he could play in the NFL until 50

More on the Urban Meyer to USC rumors


Guest: Albert Breer
